races.name: Nord
races.description: Natives of Skyrim, hardy and resistant to cold

racial_ability.name: Resist Frost
racial_ability.effect: +2 to Physique rolls to resist cold damage or freezing conditions

power.name: Battle Cry
power.effect: Once per session, create advantage 'Frightened Enemies' with one free invoke (enemies within close range)

races.name: Imperial
races.description: Well-educated and well-spoken, native to Cyrodiil

racial_ability.name: Voice of the Emperor
racial_ability.effect: Once per session, automatically succeed at Rapport roll to calm a hostile NPC or avoid combat

races.name: Breton
races.description: Magically gifted humans from High Rock

racial_ability.name: Resist Magic
racial_ability.effect: +2 to Will rolls to resist magical effects

power.name: Dragonskin
power.effect: Once per session, absorb one magical attack completely (negate all stress and effects)

races.name: Redguard
races.description: Warriors from Hammerfell, naturally skilled with weapons

racial_ability.name: Resist Poison
racial_ability.effect: +2 to Physique rolls to resist poison

power.name: Adrenaline Rush
power.effect: Once per session, ignore all stress boxes for one scene

races.name: High Elf (Altmer)
races.description: Tall elves from Summerset Isles, gifted with magic

racial_ability.name: Highborn Heritage
racial_ability.effect: +1 to all Lore rolls related to magic or spellcasting

power.name: Highborn
power.effect: Once per session, gain +2 to all Lore rolls for one entire scene

races.name: Wood Elf (Bosmer)
races.description: Agile elves from Valenwood, natural archers

racial_ability.name: Resist Disease
racial_ability.effect: +2 to Physique rolls to resist disease and poison

power.name: Command Animal
power.effect: Once per session, befriend or calm any one animal, creating aspect 'Animal Ally' with two free invokes

races.name: Dark Elf (Dunmer)
races.description: Elves from Morrowind, resistant to fire

racial_ability.name: Resist Fire
racial_ability.effect: +2 to Physique rolls to resist fire damage

power.name: Ancestor's Wrath
power.effect: Once per session, surround self with flame aura that deals 2 stress to all enemies in melee range for one exchange

races.name: Orc
races.description: Strong and tough warriors, known for their smithing

racial_ability.name: Warrior's Blood
racial_ability.effect: +1 to Physique for determining stress boxes

power.name: Berserker Rage
power.effect: Once per session, double all stress dealt and taken for one scene

races.name: Khajiit
races.description: Cat-like people from Elsweyr, agile and stealthy

racial_ability.name: Night Eye
racial_ability.effect: Never suffer penalties from darkness or poor lighting

power.name: Claws
power.effect: Unarmed attacks deal normal stress (instead of reduced damage)

races.name: Argonian
races.description: Reptilian people from Black Marsh, immune to many ailments

racial_ability.name: Resist Disease and Poison
racial_ability.effect: Automatically succeed at all Physique rolls to resist disease or poison

power.name: Histskin
power.effect: Once per session, rapidly regenerate health - recover all physical stress immediately

character_creation_rules.race_selection: Choose one race during Session Zero
character_creation_rules.racial_power: Racial powers can be used once per session (refreshes at start of new session)
character_creation_rules.skill_bonuses: Add racial skill bonuses to base skill ratings during character creation
character_creation_rules.starting_aspect: Use suggested starting aspect or create custom aspect that reflects racial heritage
